channel.description: Recent content in docker on Dan Cigrang

item.title: Setting Up Mid Server using Docker
item.description: Introduction Since the Rome release, ServiceNow provides a download of a MID Server configuration using a Docker container. To start, download the Docker config from the MID Server downloads page on the instance by going to MID Server > Downloads and clicking on the download link under Linux Docker Recipe. Included in the download are some scripts and assets that are required to build the image. Since there are parameters that you need to include in the build and rather than providing a full image, the instance only needs to download text files of scripts and a Dockerfile.
